content: mustard in my sample until you are ready for the toe your pinky toe is covered toe on needle 2 knit to the marker middle of the sole cut color 3 and continue with color 1 light grey in my sample or color 2 peachy pink in my sample knit to the end of the round back to the marker begin decreases as follows round 1 on both needles k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 2 knit repeat these 2 rounds until you have 22 sts remaining on each needle then continue decreasing on every row until you have 8 sts remaining on each needle kitchener remaining sts weave in all the ends soak and block the socks put on your fluffy socks and enjoy #teaknitting #rosemarysocks 5
